title: Composer's Solution Vol.1: Immersive & Beautiful Dark Cinematic Music
description: 16 Immersive & Beautiful Dark Cinematic Composer's Soundtracks (full preview avaliable)
longDescription:
[Composer's Solution Vol.1: Immersive & Beautiful Dark Cinematic Music] Pack contains

16 unique and interesting Composer's OST by Aquartos, WAVE format, 55 min of music:


Full preview with TimeCodes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7P3hcGhR1IM


  1. Crystal City
  2. Precursor
  3. Among Darkness
  4. The World of illusions
  5. Lower City
  6. Grey City
  7. Drifting Abyss
  8. Back Home
  9. Mortal's Rules
  10. The Fall
  11. D-MAN
  12. Cyber Metropolis
  13. Cyborg's March
  14. I'm Still Alive
  15. Snow Was falling
  16. The Last Waltz


Contact: AquartosProduction@gmail.com

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Made with soul, without cliche and without copying other authors, from concept to mastering
  •  Unique Author's Sound by Aquartos
  •  Mastered special for games

Number of Audio Wavs: 16

Number of Audio Cues: 16

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 55

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Thanks for your attention!
